column4: hey guys, NeoGeo64 says he has mplayer, mozilla-mplayer, and w32codecs, but can't play realplayer stuff in mplayer.  Anyone know how that could be?
ugh.  Today is not a good day for #ubuntu
god damnit, stupid AOLers
what is their problem?
where's our admins...
oops, that was for Maneiten
won't that fuck up everything depening on libc6 (as in alot)?
What if I get the .deb from ubuntu and install it using dpkg -i? :)
Well I know there's a way to get apt-get or synaptic to install the proper version of it, over whatever you put on, and if something breaks dependencies it uninstalls all the things that need it
Do you know how? :)
Did you catch the last question?
no, there's too many questions and I can't really keep up, sorry
I see. Just wanted to know if you knew how to do what you mentioned
no, I don't, but an instance where someone did that is documented on the forums, let me find it
thanks :)
we're talking about installing an older .deb, right?
We're talking about installing the libc6-version from the ubuntu resp. over a manually installed .deb file from the debian resp.
Using Debians libc6 version on a ubuntu system obviousley isn't a good idea

okay, I found the forum post.  In it, they fix kubuntu-desktop by saying sudo apt-get install konversation=0.16-1ubuntu1 .  Find the version that you want to install, and um, force it over using the = sign perhaps..   I don't really know a lot about this though
thanks, i'll try
Thanks! ;)
did it work?
you should be able to get java from hoary-extras
